mapper.select: select * from (SELECT student_id,course_id FROM student_course where student_id=#{id} and study=1) as course join notice on notice.notice_courseid=course.course_id

select course2.student_id,course2.nitice_id,course2.notice_courseid,notice_time,notice_content,notice_read from (select student_id,course_id,id nitice_id,notice_courseid,notice_time,notice_content from (SELECT student_id,course_id FROM student_course where student_id=1 and study=1) as course1 join notice on notice.notice_courseid=course1.course_id) as course2 left join student_notice on course2.notice_courseid=student_notice.notice_courseid and course2.student_id=student_notice.student_id and student_notice.nitice_id=course2.nitice_id
